alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 09 at 2:33PM PDT until April 11 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SUNDAY TO 11 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Douglas County, and eastern Curry County and Josephine County, including Camas Valley, Sitkum, Galice, Selma, Sexton Summit, portions of Interstate 5, and portions of highways 199 and 42. * WHEN...From 11 PM Sunday to 11 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
